summary:
How do you deal with users that can't find what they are looking for?  Are they getting lost in the FAQ?   Do they have to watch multiple videos, and work their way through numerous documents? 📹  🤯 📝  

That’s where the power of AI comes in... 🤖 🧠 

Imagine that your product can interact with your users as if it was a real person: 👨‍💻🌐👨🏻‍💻

It becomes reality with the release of our conversational UI platform powered by GPT. A platform with advanced AI features and privacy protection technology, powered by our new open-source component framework. 

Are you ready to add AI to your web application and take your SaaS product to the next level? 📱✨

Our promise, an impressive user experience that will ensure:

- Next level onboarding 📈
- Skyrocketing activation figures 🚀 
- A tremendous decrease of workload and support cost 👩🏾‍💻

Free free to connect with me on email: alain@unless.com, (or LinkedIn), if you want to learn more about how organizations such as Visma have benefited from our product experience platform.

projects.title: Forum for Orphans Malindi (Pendo) - Salesforce Foundation
projects.description:
Organised a fundraising project through Salesforce Foundation on behalf of Forum for Orphans Malindi or Pendo (www.english.pendo-kenia.org/.org), which contributed to 9 day-care centres and supported more than 3,000 orphans since 2003 who benefit from the actions of the organization. 

The organization was started in order to assist the dramatically rising number of poor, orphaned children and those infected with HIV or other sicknesses. A survey conducted by the Kenyan government in 2004 showed that there were around 18,520 orphaned children around the area of Malindi alone.The main objectives are to supply the children with psychological support, basic education, health care and nutrition.

Henry Ndurya established the organization Forum for Orphans Malindi (Pendo) to support the orphaned and vulnerable children in and around Malindi. Since its founding, Mr. Ndurya and his team have been able to establish and build 20 schools where more than 3.000 children have found refugee. 

Our project was executed in two stages; 

- A pub quiz and poker fundraising event that was organized as a collection on behalf of Pendo in order to raise financial support and awareness for the children in Wantamu. 

- Organised a team from Salesforce to assist in the construction of sanitary facilities for three schools in Wantamu, as well as the renovation of several classroom over the nine school that are still in need of support from Pendo.

projects.title: Clean water project in Nicaragua
projects.description:
Fundraising and Volunteering activities for Surf For Life

Surf For Life sponsors educational and community driven development projects in coastal communities.

projects.title: Hand in Hand - Salesforce Foundation
projects.description:
Organised a fundraising project through Salesforce Foundation on behalf of Hand in Hand (www.handinhaninternational.org), which contributed to 67 members trained, 66 business supported, 116 jobs created and 578 lives changed.

Hand in Hand International is a member of the Hand in Hand Network, a global group of NGOs working to fight poverty in 10 countries and counting. The goal is to create 10 million jobs in some of the world’s poorest communities.

The project was executed in two stages; 

- A black tie fundraising event was organized as a collection on behalf of Hand in Hand

- Organised a team from Salesforce to participate in a Marathon that was held in Stockholm (over 40,000 registered participants) in order to raise financial support and awareness for the children in Tamilnadu (India). Also constructed a website especially built and set up for the marathon were people were able to support our cause: www.run4charity.eu.

profile_positions.description:
The mission of Unless is to help you improve your user experience. 

Our conversational UI platform offers businesses an AI-driven solution that facilitates personalized conversations with every user. This is made possible through a variety of conversational UI components that can be effortlessly added to any existing website or web-application without requiring technical expertise.

Unless is headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands and our customers include world’s leading companies like Visma and A.S. Watson.
profile_positions.title: Chief Commercial Officer

profile_positions.description:
• Helping Mid Sized organisations evaluate and maximise their VoIP and UCaaS investment.
• Proven track record of acquiring net new logos and exceeding revenue targets individually. 
• Focus on well known sales methodologies like SPIN, Challenger Sale, and MEDDIC.
• Experience in solution-selling to Business Development, IT, and Marketing stakeholders.
• Track record of managing, optimizing and contributing to the sales technology infrastructure and processes to support growth.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
As Co-Founder with The Temple, I designed our Go-to-Market Strategy, Branding, Sales & Marketing Automation and SaaS implementation. My main duties included; 

• Brand positioning of The Temple 
• SaaS implementation process
• Development of Commercial strategies with Partners 
• Inbound Marketing Strategy with HubSpot 
• Creation of Ecommerce Site with Shopify: www.TheTemple.shop
• Coaching of new remote talent via Upwork: 537 hours and $6.513,33 billed 
• Development of Health Blog via Wordpress: www.TheTemple.io
• Social Media Strategy for Instagram: @TagTheTemple 

The Temple to date has served more than 1000 customers in over 20 countries.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
• Lead a team of highly talented Business Development Representatives to drive the pipeline.
• Engage with clients to promote a User Generated Content approach in order to drive growth. 
• Collaborate with consumers and brands to develop a fair and transparent marketplace. 
• Work with marketing and technology departments to execute sales strategies.
• Create outbound opportunities consistently at or above quota level.
• Proven track record of building effective go-to-market strategies.
profile_positions.title: Manager - Business Development Team

profile_positions.description:
• Manage a large pipeline of inbound leads in more than 20+ countries across EMEA. 
• Identify, recruit, and develop a portfolio of 75+ prospective high value re-seller partners.
• Maintain high levels of prospecting activity with prospective re-sellers.
• Develop the ability to dissect a marketing agency's business goals. 
• Help Agencies to develop a better plan for achieving Sales and Marketing objectives.
• Become an expert at presenting how Inbound can help an agency improve their business.
• Close new business consistently at or above quota level.
•  Identify partners who are willing to invest both time and money in Inbound Marketing.
• Work with marketing and technology departments to execute sales strategies.
profile_positions.title: Channel Account Executive

profile_positions.description:
• Lead qualification for all leads and sales opportunities.
• Up-selling and leveraging business from new and established customer relationships.
• Managing the entire sales process to ensure delivery against key performance metrics.
• Territory identification and research, to formalise a go to market territory strategy
• Pipeline development through a combination of cold calling and email campaigns.
• Create and maintain a sales pipeline to ensure over-achievement.
• Manage the end to end sales process through engagement of appropriate resources.
• Generate short-term results whilst maintaining a long term strategy.
• Provide accurate monthly forecasting and revenue delivery.
• Leverage consultative selling approaches and drive  transformational customer engagement.
profile_positions.title: Account Executive - SMB

profile_positions.description:
• On-boarding and Mentoring of new hires, ensuring they are fully productive quickly. 
• Leading new hire team meetings to review process and best practice sharing. 
• Own Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Marketing Cloud and Platform offerings.
• Responsible for ensuring the team is regularly trained, and assist with messaging and tools.
• Building dashboards, territory coverage modeling and cold calling practice.
• Coordinating and driving team engagement on campaigns.
profile_positions.title: Team Lead - Business Development

profile_positions.description:
• Creating and nurturing relationships on C level with key stake holders in targeted accounts. 
• Generating new business opportunities to fuel the Enterprise Pipeline.
• Collaborate with Account Managers in order to carry out account-specific strategies. 
• Educate and help firms to be prepared for the Internet of Things (IoT) revolution. 
• Creating and prioritizing strategic target accounts.
• Salesforce Social Ambassador.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Specialist

volunteer_experiences.description:
The Swiss Entrepreneurship Program strengthens emerging entrepreneurial ecosystems to create a thriving, sustainable world. As Entrepreneur-In-Residence with NESsT, I provided sales and marketing advice to Peruvian start up's. Next to shaping the entrepreneurial culture of the region, I spend time working one-on-one with entrepreneurs helping them to develop their business plans and go-to-market strategies. My main duties included;

- Providing guidance on brand positioning
- Guiding entrepreneurs through SaaS implementation process
- Developing commercial strategies
- Coaching of product development

 NESsT invests in social enterprises that generate dignified jobs for people most in need. They use an engaged approach providing one-on-one business development support to social entrepreneurs in emerging markets. So far, NESsT has invested in 187 social enterprises that have improved the lives of 525,000+ people.

At Tuk Tuk Cartel, we established a new kind of NGO. Through adventurous volunteer projects and a community built around generous world-changers, who focus on creativity and entrepreneurship, we want to re-invent the non-profit wheel on a global scale.

Our vision is a more interconnected community where volunteers, corporates and beneficiaries alike feel empowered not only by our projects, but by the things they learn and the relationships they build during a unique experience together. Our mission is to create a global community that supports projects in developing countries which focus on education, innovation and sustainability.

ACE is a social enterprise that produces solar-biomass energy systems in developing countries.
